title: Heidi Klum is fashionable in double denim for second day of America's Got Talent: Champions filming
text:
Heidi Klum was all smiles as she arrived for the second day of filming for the America's Got Talent: Champions season.

The 46-year-old model and TV personality went all denim for the taping Saturday in Pasadena pairing a large shirt with wide leg pants.

The newly married star paired her look with glamorous curls as she arrived with her co-judges.

Double denim: Heidi Klum was all smiles as she arrived for the second day of filming for the America's Got Talent: Champions season in Pasadena on Saturday

The German model also wore snakeskin stilettos and purple aviator sunglasses.

Heidi carried a brown purse on her shoulder and wore delicate silver and gold rings on her right hand.

Her pants were cuffed above her ankles showing off her stylish footwear.

Glam: The model and TV personality paired a denim short tucked into wide leg blue jean pants rolled up at the bottoms

Accessories: The German model wore snakeskin stilettos and purple aviator sunglasses and she carried a brown purse

Klum was joined at the studio by her new co-judge, singer and Britain's Got Talent panelist Alesha Dixon, 40, and AGT judge Howie Mandel, 63.

Dixon recently welcomed her second child with her backing dancer husband, Azuka Onenye, 39, but they have yet to reveal any details about the baby.

The Brit arrived at the studio in a lowcut black bodysuit, high waited green slacks and fresh white low top Converse.

She donned small oval sunglasses while heading into the taping with her daughter.

Fresh face: Co-judge Alesha Dixon arrived at the studio in a low-cut black bodysuit, high-waisted green slacks and white Converse sneakers

Shades: She donned small oval sunglasses while heading into the taping with her daughter

The former Deal or No Deal host cut a casual look in blue Adidas sweat pants that were pushed up just below his knee and a t-shirt.

He paired it with a black LA insignia cap and pink sneakers.

Simon Cowell, 59, and Terry Crews, 51, have also been lined up for the show, although they weren't seen on Saturday.

Veteran host: Howie Mandel host cut a casual look in blue Adidas sweat pants that were pushed up just below his knee and a t-shirt

Finger guns: He paired it with a black LA insignia cap and pink sneakers

Earlier this week Heidi recently revealed she is changing her last name to Kaulitz after marrying Tokio Hotel band member Tom Kaulitz, 30, in early August.

The couple were first seen in public together at the Cannes Film Festival in the South of France in 2018.

Heidi was previously married to British musician Seal from 2005 to 2014, and they share children Helene, 15, Henry, 14, Johan, 12, and Lou, nine.
description:
Heidi Klum beamed as she arrived for the second day of filming the America's Got Talent: Champions season, on Saturday.
She went all denim for the taping in Pasadena.
